title: Harrogate Storage Solutions – Testimonials
description: We take pride in offering more space at less cost

items.title: Great service
items.content: Convenient, Secure and great price what more can you ask for. Highly recommended to anyone needing storage.
items.author: James

items.title: Quality At HSS
items.content: We used HSS for 2 months, it was so handy, very good security, ample space for vehicles, access 24 hours a day, own code. Staff excellent. Recommend HSS ANY TIME. Cheers Les.
items.author: Les Chandler

items.title: Very happy
items.content: Very happy with the service for our caravan storage, the 24hour access is a great bonus allowing us to have felixibility. Good location for us and friendly service from Lorraine too.
items.author: Tj

items.title: Superheros!
items.content: The team at HSS must eat kryptonite for breakfast – 5 mins after popping in to enquire I had a secure storage space all sorted with 24h security cameras and pin code gated access at a very fair price. Thank you!
items.author: Andy

items.title: Great Service
items.content: Really nice people and very very helpful, I use the storage for my property company and its very handy with lots of space for vehicles to pickup or deliver goods. Highly Recommended
items.author: The Houseman

items.title: Highly Professional and excellent service
items.content: I’m using this storage for the second month now and can only say that this facility is run by a very professional and friendly manager. Units are definitely best in the area as to waterproofing so if your in the need for that extra space this would be the best solution. I have been renting units around Harrogate for the past 8 years and this is by far one of the best places.
items.author: Adi

items.title: Great, professional service
items.content: Great, professional service, I would highly recommend using these guys I would rate them the best in Harrogate and best value for money. Lorraine is lovely!
items.author: Sarah Bartley

items.title: My favourite self-storage outfit
items.content: Literally my favourite self-storage outfit in the whole of Harrogate! Very secure, suberb staff. Highly recommended
items.author: Tim Harland

items.title: Excellent Service
items.content: HSS have provided a friendly, efficient and secure service at a reasonable price. Highly recommended! Store with confidence!
items.author: Juris Grinbergs

items.title: Brilliant service and great prices
items.content: Been using Harrogate Storage Solutions for storing my work tools and stock, great access, great prices and great service – friendly staff.
items.author: Richard B

items.title: Really Helpful Staff
items.content: Really helpful staff and easy to use storage facility with very affordable prices!
items.author: Abi Nelson

items.title: Excellent service would highly recommend
items.content: I have be using garages to store my kit in for the last 4 years and again had to move out… so bit the bullet… popped into Harrogate storage solutions Friday morning for information and was signed up and moving in that same day… excellent service would highly recommend… I might even be tempted to take a larger unit…
items.author: Micheal

items.title: Thank you!
items.content: Now that we have emptied our containers I would just like to say thank you for the service that you have provided. It has always been a pleasure to deal with Harrogate Storage Solutions and with yourself. I will have no hesitation in recommending your services when I have an opportunity.
items.author: Bary G

items.title: Fabulous service
items.content: Fabulous service, efficient and friendly. The free use of the van to transport my items was an added bonus to an extremely professional operation. Well done guys and thank you.
items.author: Deborah Bowen

items.title: Great units at affordable prices
items.content: Great units at affordable prices. Access is easy but secure 24/7. The staff were very helpful and are there to help if needed. I’d definitely recommend them.
items.author: Andy Baxter

items.title: Easy, cost effective storage solution
items.content: Working with Harrogate Storage Solutions over the last year or so and it’s been a great experience. Great service at great prices and such a convenient location. Their on site team are always there to help and accommodate in any way they can.
items.author: James

items.title: Great value
items.content: Great value for money and easy access. Lorraine has been very helpful throughout too.
items.author: James Skaith

items.title: Friendly service
items.content: Great friendly service used for almost two years no probs at all very good and very secure.
items.author: Darren Anderson

items.title: Very helpful
items.content: Very helpful and efficient service with great value and flexibility!
items.author: Harry Towers

items.title: Very impressed
items.content: I have used the facilities at Harrogate Storage Solutions on two occasions and both times have been very impressed with the service provided and the quality of the storage units. The first occasion it was during a house move and I required regular access to my belongings, which was easily facilitated whilst maintaining a high level of security. My initial experience with the company was so positive that when I recently required storage for some personal and work related items they were an obvious choice. Lorraine is extremely helpful and offers excellent advice on what storage is most appropriate for the quantity of items that you wish to store. If you have a storage requirement I would highly recommend them.
items.author: Barry Groves

items.title: Extremely helpful
items.content: We have rented a unit for just over a year after downsizing our home. Lorraine has been extremely helpful with everything. Can’t recommend them highly enough.
items.author: Kay Howard

items.title: Always available and helpful
items.content: We rented a unit for a few months whilst we had building work done. Lorraine was brilliant, always available and helpful, going out of her way to make sure that it was as easy as possible for us to move in. Thank you Lorraine!
items.author: Michael Cox

items.title: Friendly and helpful
items.content: Thanks for everything. The storage unit and access was perfect for our needs, and everyone has been friendly and helpful.
items.author: Michael Domstead

items.title: Smooth process
items.content: This is a great storage company in Harrogate. The units are clean, easy to access and good value. Michelle is friendly, professional and makes sure the whole process runs smoothly and without fuss. Highly recommended.
items.author: Andrew Thompson

items.title: Very useful complementary van
items.content: Great service. Really helpful and quick to respond. The van that’s available to borrow is really helpful.
items.author: Daniel Ward

items.title: I would always, without hesitation recommend Harrogate Storage Solutions
items.content: I have used Harrogate Storage Solutions for both long term, business, and short term, personal. The service I have received has been exceptional. Nothing seems to be a problem for them and always happy to help. I would always, without hesitation recommend Harrogate Storage Solutions to anyone needing this kind of service.
items.author: Chris Arnold

items.title: The units are spotless, dry and super secure
items.content: Harrogate Storage Solutions have been brilliant throughout my time spent storing goods with them. Michelle has been helpful and accommodating from day 1. I was even able to make use of their van to move my goods across from my old workplace to my unit at HSS. The units are spotless, dry and super secure. I would highly recommend them and will definitely use again if I need to int he future. Thanks!
items.author: Sean Knott

items.title: Very friendly, helpful, flexible, and all at a very good price
items.content: Harrogate Storage Solutions were absolutely brilliant when we used them during our move. Various delays with our house purchase meant that we had to keep changing our plans, and I don't know how we would have fared without the flexibility that Lorraine offered. For the actual day of the move, we found that no rental vans were available, as we only had a confirmed date at the last minute, but were able to use the van from HSS for that day, and then book a rental van to slowly empty our units. Very friendly, helpful, flexible, and all at a very good price. Being able to park right next to the unit was another bonus. Thank you so much Lorraine!
items.author: Andy and Jo

cta.title: Get in touch
cta.content: Fill in your details on our contact page and one of the team will get back to you as quickly as possible with a quote.
